name.en: Introduction to Infertility and Assisted Reproductive Technology
name.ch: 不孕與人工輔助生殖技術

department.ch: 生醫科學與工程學系系統生物與生物資訊碩士班
department.en: Master Program in Systems Biology and Bioinformatics, Department of Biomedical Sciences and Engineering

goal.ch: 不孕是指一對夫婦在一年內進行正常性生活，但仍未能懷孕。不孕可能是由多種原因引起的，包括男性和女性因素。男性因素可能涉及精子質量和數量的問題，而女性因素則可能涉及卵子質量、子宮內膜問題、排卵障礙或子宮結構異常等。人工輔助生殖技術（Assisted Reproductive Technology，ART）是一項用於治療不孕症的醫學技術，它包括多種方法來增加懷孕的機會。本概論課程是上學生了解相關知識與目前產業發展現況，鼓勵學生能投入相關產業。
goal.en: Infertility refers to the inability of a couple to conceive despite having regular sexual intercourse for a year. Infertility can be caused by various factors, including both male and female factors. Male factors may involve issues with sperm quality and quantity, while female factors may involve egg quality, uterine lining problems, ovulation disorders, or abnormalities in the uterus's structure. Assisted Reproductive Technology (ART) is a medical technique used to treat infertility, and it includes various methods to enhance the chances of getting pregnant. This introductory course aims to provide students with an understanding of the relevant knowledge and the current industry developments in the field of infertility and assisted reproductive technology. It encourages students to engage in related industries and stay updated with the advancements in the field.

outline.ch:
1. 簡介-不孕症與人工輔助生殖技術
2. 生殖系統解剖生理學
3. 配子[精子、卵子]
4. 臨床女性生殖生理與內分泌學
5. 人工輔助生殖技術總論
6. 精液分析與人工受精療程
7. 體外受精療程
8. 期中考
9. 體外受精技術
10. 卵子的評估與單一精子卵質內顯微注射技術
11. 胚胎的培養與評估
12. 高通量實驗技術在人工輔助生殖技術之運用 (1)
13. 高通量實驗技術在人工輔助生殖技術之運用 (2)
14. 配子與胚胎冷凍、解凍技術
15. 受精卵解凍、冷凍、培養、著床前檢查
16. 胚胎師相關學習歷程與工作經驗分享
17. 參訪生殖醫學中心
18. 期末考
outline.en:
1. Introduction - Infertility and Assisted Reproductive Technology
2. Anatomy and Physiology of the Reproductive System
3. Gametes (Sperm and Oocytes)
4. Clinical Female Reproductive Physiology and Endocrinology
5. Overview of Assisted Reproductive Technology
6. Semen Analysis and Artificial Insemination Procedures
7. In Vitro Fertilization Procedures
8. Midterm Exam
9. In Vitro Fertilization Techniques
10. Evaluation of Oocytes and Intracytoplasmic Sperm Injection (ICSI)
11. Embryo Culture and Evaluation
12. Application of High-Throughput Experimental Techniques in Assisted Reproductive Technology (Part 1)
13. Application of High-Throughput Experimental Techniques in Assisted Reproductive Technology (Part 2)
14. Cryopreservation and Thawing Techniques for Gametes and Embryos
15. Thawing, Cryopreservation, Culture, and Pre-Implantation Examination of Embryos
16. Journey and Experiences of an Embryologist
17. Visit to Reproductive Medicine Center
18. Final Exam

gradMethod.ch:
實驗 10%
出席 10%
心得報告 80%
